entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
